Row.Text: Author: Gedemon[NEWLINE]Size: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Small[/COLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Take control of three U.S. Marine Divisions and try to take Iwo Jima with minimal casualties.
